name: Snake (itch) (The Coding Boy)
description:
This is my first game. I hope you like it.

In this game you have to eat the red fuits to grow. But if you touch you own body or the border of the map you go died and you have to start again.

You can move with W, A, S and D

It doesn't have a icon because id don't now how to put an icon on a .exe file.
